text: (Shishe) ying gui naxie pin min, tamen xianshen yu zhu dao, buneng dao yuanfang qu mousheng; buming tamen de zhenxiang de ren, yiwei tamen shi fuzu de, yinwei tamen buken xiang ren qitao. Ni cong tamen de yibiao keyi renshi tamen, tamen bu hui naonao buxiu di xiang ren qitao. Nimen suo shishe de renhe mei wu, que shi zhenzhu suo zhidao de.
